评论详情: I get more compliments on this dress than any other piece in my closet. It is so flattering, and the colors are so vibrant. It is a tight-weaved sweater-type material, but it isn't hot.

I first tried this dress on in a well known expensive department store.  I loved it but the price was way out of my budget. I was so happy to see it here at an affordable price.  While it might be pre-loved, it looks brand new.  I cannot wait to wear it.  It can definitely be dressed up with heels or worn more casually with sneakers.One size comment. In the department store I tried on a medium. I am almost always a medium but it felt a bit small. I bought the large and it fits perfectly.

评论概述: You must be tall to wear this dress
评论详情: This dress was expensive for what you get.  I did not like the feel of the fabric and the fit was way off. The dress fit fine as long as I bunched it through the rib area but that looked funny. I returns it.
Beautiful dress, fantastic quality! It fit wonderfully and it does not seem to have any signs of previous wear. The only downside is that it is dry clean only.
